thread.title: Philip Green
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Philip Green

author: Philip Green
title: Philip Green
text: Fantastic service, I found all the equipment I was needing for very good prices, free expedited shipping and was finished in minutes from start to finish. One of the best organized vendors I have ever done business with. Thank You. I would highly recommend B&H to everyone.
